name: Harbingers of Desspair
summary:
You have died, and those aren't the pearly gates before you...
Your soul has traveled through a wormhole and ended up on the remains of a library on the remnants of a once thriving moon...you hear a mystical voice in your mind directing you to talk to a skeleton a short distance ahead...

After some 'training' the skeleton has you follow him to a magical rostrum where you can select a new body for your soul to inhabit...
You are presented with 32 different bodies and the ability to possess an instance of Desspair himself or one of his trusted Guild Officers before traveling back in time to try and help stop the wormhole from causing the devastation and your interesting predicament...

Embark on an epic adventure as you Explore, Quest, & Survive in the 1st batch of 14 wonderous zones...

With the setting of a Jupiter sized planet with 3 earth sized moons along with a couple pocket dimensions for good measure, good times & numerous memorable adventures are bound to be had...
